response.overview: Every year over 500,000 people are reported missing in the United States. It's every parent's worst nightmare when a child disappears, and the family is torn apart; a son's painful journey to find the mother lost almost half a century ago; a strange disappearance is followed by an even more bizarre return; a wife and daughter vanish into a cult. The search, the suspicion, the denials all unraveled in Missing Without A Trace.
response.title: Missing Without A Trace
